title: Our Prices
laundryIncludes: Including sheets, household linens, everyday clothes and baby clothes
sizeAndWeight: Size and weight of garment: Bulky items (long coat, evening dress) generally require more work and products.
fabricType: Fabric type: Silk, leather, cashmere or technical fabrics require specific and more delicate treatments.
numberOfPieces: Number of pieces: A suit (jacket + pants) will be priced differently than a single shirt.
soilingDegree: Degree of soiling: Complex stains or very dirty clothes may require additional treatment.
specialFinishes: Special finishes: Embroidery, sequins or delicate ornaments require special attention.
orderUrgency: Order urgency: Express service may incur an additional cost.
